function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variations in virus RNA recovery affecting correlations","Impact":"Misinterpretation of disease prevalence in the catchment area","Mitigation":"Standardizing the virus RNA recovery process and establishing error margins for variation","Technologies":"Standardized RNA extraction kits, automated qPCR platforms","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in estimated prevalence data","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of disease prevalence in the catchment area","Mitigation":"Improving data collection methods and increasing sample size","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling software, advanced statistical analysis tools","People":"Epidemiologists, data scientists","Owner":"Public health agencies, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Differences in wastewater composition affecting bioindicator utilization","Impact":"Incorrect calculation of disease incidence in the catchment area","Mitigation":"Validation of bioindicator factors and assessing their reliability","Technologies":"Laboratory testing for bioindicators, data validation algorithms","People":"Environmental scientists, public health researchers","Owner":"Environmental research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
